name: Brawler
title: Brawler
subclassbonus1: Bully: For Intimidation checks, you can use your STR modifier, along with any levels of Focus.
subclassbonus2: Survivor: Bonus die on all STR and DUR checks to avoid Status Effect.
subclassbonus3: Warrior: Add extra d8 Physical Damage to successful Bludgeoning attack.

name: Explorer
title: Explorer
subclassbonus1: Ranger: No Speed penalties from Difficult
subclassbonus2: Seasoned: For Perception checks, use KNO modifier + Focus.
subclassbonus3: Tracker: Get 1 bonus die on all checks to track living entities and vehicles.

name: Healer
title: Healer
subclassbonus1: Diagnosis: Bonus die on checks to understand physical/mental state of entities.
subclassbonus2: Mender: Heal entities for 3d4 with Med Kits, doubles to 6d4 on Crit Success.
subclassbonus3: Shaman: 1 additional use of medical resources (Amnestics, Med Kits, etc.).

name: Marksman
title: Marksman
subclassbonus1: Bullseye: Artillery attacks within 1 meter do not suffer penalty die.
subclassbonus2: Punisher: Add 1d4 Physical Damage to successful Artillery attack.
subclassbonus3: Relentless: 1 bonus die on checks to find hiding entities.

name: Occultist
title: Occultist
subclassbonus1: Aberrant: Once per turn, add a d6 Anomalous Damage to a successful attack.
subclassbonus2: Medium: For Examination checks, use POW modifier + Focus.
subclassbonus3: Outsider: Connection with anomalous entities provides unique information.

name: Showman
title: Showman
subclassbonus1: Blessed: For 5 Luck, make a Fortune roll automatically succeed.
subclassbonus2: Momentum: On a roll of 20 or higher on Ability check, regain 1 Luck point.
subclassbonus3: Orator: Automatically gain 1 level of Focus in Charisma-based Skills.

name: Technician
title: Technician
subclassbonus1: Academic: Automatically gain 1 level of Focus in every Knowledge-based Skill.
subclassbonus2: Engineer: Bonus die on checks to use, make, or repair Tools, Installations, or Vehicles.
subclassbonus3: Rhetoric: For Negotiation checks, use KNO modifier + Focus.
